statements: SELECT * FROM peer_review_data ORDER BY submission_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT author_name, review_date FROM peer_review_data WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT author_name, review_comments FROM peer_review_data WHERE review_comments IS NOT NULL
SELECT submission_date, review_comments FROM peer_review_data WHERE author_name = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM peer_review_data ORDER BY review_date ASC
SELECT * FROM peer_review_data WHERE submission_date > '2021-01-01' AND author_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, submission_date FROM peer_review_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT author_name, review_comments FROM peer_review_data WHERE review_comments LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY author_name, review_date;
SELECT author_name, submission_date, review_comments FROM peer_review_data WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, review_date FROM peer_review_data WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND review_comments IS NOT NULL ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM peer_review_data;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_date FROM peer_review_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM research_management_system ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, research_topic FROM research_management_system WHERE paper_id = 2;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_date, paper_title FROM peer_review_data WHERE reviewer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_date, paper_title FROM peer_review_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM research_management_system WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, paper_title FROM peer_review_data WHERE reviewer_name LIKE 'John%' AND paper_title LIKE '%Machine Learning%';
SELECT author_name, research_topic, publication_date FROM research_management_system WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT reviewer_name, review_date, paper_title FROM peer_review_data ORDER BY review_date ASC, reviewer_name DESC;
SELECT id, reviewer_id, submission_id, review_date, review_score FROM peer_review_data;
SELECT submission_id, reviewer_id, review_score, id, review_date FROM peer_review_data;
SELECT review_date, review_score, reviewer_id, submission_id, id FROM peer_review_data;
SELECT research_theme, publication_date, paper_id, id, author_id FROM research_management;
SELECT publication_date, author_id, research_theme, id, paper_id FROM research_management;
SELECT * FROM peer_review_data WHERE review_score > 4;
SELECT reviewer_id, submission_id, review_date FROM peer_review_data WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT research_theme, publication_date FROM research_management WHERE publication_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, analysis_id, analysis_result FROM comprehensive_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT paper_id, author_id, publication_date FROM research_management WHERE research_theme = 'Machine Learning' ORDER BY publication_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM peer_review_data WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT id, reviewer_id, review_date FROM peer_review_data ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT paper_id, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM peer_review_data GROUP BY paper_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM research_management_system WHERE end_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT researcher_id, project_id, start_date FROM research_management_system WHERE researcher_id = 2 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM peer_review_data WHERE review_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT reviewer_id, paper_id FROM peer_review_data WHERE reviewer_id = 1001 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT project_id FROM comprehensive_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT peer_review_data.reviewer_id, integration_date FROM peer_review_data JOIN integration_data ON peer_review_data.id = integration_data.peer_review_id;
SELECT * FROM research_management_system WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM peer_review_data;
SELECT author_id, rating, comments FROM peer_review_data WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT review_date, reviewer_id, rating FROM peer_review_data ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT research_id, peer_review_id, integration_status FROM integration_data WHERE integration_status = TRUE;
SELECT analysis_id, research_id, result FROM comprehensive_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT id, author_id, paper_id, reviewer_id, review_date, rating, comments FROM peer_review_data WHERE author_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM research_management_system WHERE funding_source = 'Government' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, researcher_id, funding_source FROM research_management_system WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM integration_data WHERE research_id = 10 AND integration_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC, role_id ASC;
